Google's Eric Schmidt Sees "Bubble" Google has made 87 acquisitions worth$ 8.4 billion in the last 10 years, but the recent high valuations placed on some high-profile Internet companies has Eric Schmidt scratching his head. There are clear signs of a bubble, Mr. Eric Schmidt told the Swiss magazine Bilanz. "But valuations are what they are."
